sen.j: グンゼ記念館（グンゼきねんかん）は京都府綾部市にある博物館。
sen.e: It is a museum located in Ayabe City, Kyoto Prefecture.
It is a museum located in Ayabe City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Gunze Memorial Hall is a museum located in Ayabe City, Kyoto Prefecture.
The memorial hall was opened in 1950.
The memorial hall was opened in 1950.
The memorial hall was opened in 1950.

sen.j: グンゼの歴史を紹介する企業博物館。
sen.e: It is a corporate museum on the history of Gunze limited.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It is a corporate museum on the history of Gunze, Limited.
It is a corporate museum on the history of Gunze Limited.
sen.cmt: カンマを削除しました。

sen.j: 大正6年（1917年）に建設された西洋館の旧郡是製糸本館本社事務所を使用している
sen.e: The museum is housed in an old European style building, which was used as the headquarters of Gunze-seishi Co., Ltd., built in 1917.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The museum is housed in an old European style building, which was used as the headquarters of Gunze-seishi Co., Ltd., built in 1917.
The museum is housed in an old European style building, which was used as the headquarters of Gunze-seishi Co., Ltd., built in 1917.

sen.j: 明治29年（1896年）創業したグンゼの社史と養蚕と製糸に関する資料、錦絵を展示、紹介する。
sen.e: It exhibits and introduces the history of Gunze, which was founded in 1896, and historical materials and brocade pictures on sericulture and silk reeling.
It exhibits and introduces the history of Gunze, which was founded in 1896, and historical materials and brocade pictures on sericulture and silk reeling.
It exhibits and introduces the history of Gunze, which was founded in 1896, and both historical materials and nishiki-e (wood block prints in full color) on sericulture and silk reeling.
sen.cmt: both を挿入し、”錦絵”:nishiki-e, woodblock prints in full color として修正しました。

sen.j: - 貞明皇后行啓時の御座所を展示
sen.e: The room exhibits a facility which was used as the throne for Empress Teimei when she visited the company.
The room exhibits a facility which was used as the throne for Empress Teimei when she visited the company.
The room exhibits a facility which was used as the throne for Empress Teimei when she visited the company.
Nishiki-e (woodblock prints in full color) gallery
sen.cmt: 錦絵:nishiki-e, woodblock prints in full color としました。

sen.j: - 繰糸機械と蚕糸技術の歴史を紹介
sen.e: The room introduces the history of silk reeling machines and silk yarn technology.
The room introduces the history of silk reeling machines and silk yarn technology.
The room introduces the history of silk reeling machines and silk yarn technology.

sen.j: インフォメーションルーム

sen.cmt: 郵便番号を数字のみとしました。

sen.j: - 昭和8年築のグンゼ本社屋の左隣、大正6年築のグンゼ・本工場正門の右隣、大正初期築のグンゼ博物苑（旧繭蔵）の向かいに位置する。
sen.e: The memorial hall is located to the left of the headquarters building of Gunze built in 1933, to the right of the main gate of the Gunze main factory built in 1917, and opposite to the building of Gunze museum (old cocoon warehouse) built in the early Taisho period.

The memorial hall is located to the left of the headquarters building of Gunze built in 1933, to the right of the main gate of the Gunze main factory built in 1917, and opposite the building of Gunze museum (old cocoon warehouse) built in the early Taisho period.

The memorial hall is located to the left of the headquarters building of Gunze built in 1933, to the right of the main gate of the Gunze main factory built in 1917, and opposite the building of Gunze Museum (old cocoon warehouse) built in the early Taisho period.

sen.j: グンゼ本工場正門とともに日本建築学会から保存指定を受けた。
sen.e: The building of the memorial hall has been, along with the main gate of the Gunze main factory, designated by the Architectural Institute of Japan as a historical structure to be preserved.
Along with the main gate of the Gunze main factory, the building of the memorial hall has been designated by the Architectural Institute of Japan as an historical structure to be preserved.
Along with the main gate of the Gunze main factory, the building of the memorial hall has been designated by the Architectural Institute of Japan as an historical structure to be preserved.

sen.cmt: a.m. と p.m. を削除しました。

sen.j: - 山陰本線 綾部駅 徒歩10分
sen.e: Ten-minute walk from Ayabe station of JR Sanin Main Line
Ten-minute walk from Ayabe station of JR Sanin Main Line
